properties.areaDesc: Chicot, AR; Desha, AR; Bolivar, MS; Washington, MS
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 29 at 7:47PM CST until March 6 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Arkansas...Mississippi...Louisiana..

Mississippi River Near Arkansas City affecting Chicot...Desha...
Bolivar and Washington Counties

Mississippi River Near Greenville affecting Chicot...Issaquena...
and Washington Counties and East Carroll Parish

Mississippi River At Vicksburg affecting Madison and Tensas
Parishes and Claiborne...Jefferson and Warren Counties

Mississippi River At Natchez affecting Concordia Parish and Adams
and Wilkinson Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Mississippi River Near Arkansas City
* until late Thursday night.
* At 7:00 PM Saturday the stage was 39.8 feet and cresting.
* Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 37 feet.
* Forecast...The river will begin falling and will fall below
flood stage on Thursday.
* Impact...At 40 feet...The low silt plain in front of Arkansas City
and Huntington Point Mississippi is underwater. Several river
access roads are also impassable.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Mississippi River forecasts are based on rainfall that has occurred
and that which is forecast to occur over the next 48 hours.

Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected between 8 and 10 AM.
